title: Pixel 3XL contactless payment stopped working. How do I fix it?
content:
Contactless payment started out slow one day. I had to hold my phone to the terminal for over a minute to read. Mid way it kept saying phone was moved too fast when my phone was literally still for up to 3 minutes

By the end of day, contactless stopped working completely. I could hold the phone over a terminal for 5 minutes and it still doesn't work

I tried updating, restarting, removing my sim and putting it back but it still doesn't work and hasn't worked for almost a week.

How do I fix it?
